feed.title: The Latest News from the UK and Around the World | Sky News
feed.description: Sky news delivers breaking news, headlines and top stories from business, politics, entertainment and more in the UK and worldwide.

image.title: The Latest News from the UK and Around the World | Sky News

items.title: Some 1,200 war crimes registered in Kyiv region during Ukraine war so far, police chief says
items.description: Some 1,200 war crimes have already been registered in the Kyiv region following Russia's invasion of Ukraine, the capital's police chief has said.

items.title: Drone footage appears to show Russian military vehicles firing shots towards cyclist in Bucha
items.description: New drone footage from the Ukrainian town of Bucha, where Russia is being accused of war crimes, appears to show two of their military vehicles shooting towards a cyclist.

items.title: Musician admits murdering teenager Bobbi-Anne McLeod
items.description: A musician has pleaded guilty to the murder of teenager Bobbi-Anne McLeod.

items.title: UK, Australia and US agree to 'accelerate development' on hypersonic missile technology
items.description: The UK, US and Australia have stepped up their defence partnership by agreeing to work together on hypersonic and anti-hypersonic weaponry.

items.title: 'Heroic' neighbour sacrificed himself to save boy's life after being hit with 4kg dumbbell
items.description: A "heroic" neighbour who sacrificed his own life to protect a toddler was killed after being repeatedly struck with a dumbbell, a coroner has said.

items.title: National insurance rise: How will it work and what will it mean for you?
items.description: The national insurance rise is a significant change to our tax system - but what will it mean for you?

items.title: Zelenskyy tells UN Security Council Russia wants to turn Ukrainian people into 'silent slaves'
items.description: Volodymyr Zelenskyy has said that Russia wants to turn Ukrainians into "silent slaves" as he told the UN Security Council that Vladimir Putin's forces must be brought to justice.

items.title: Cocaine bust worth £300m is 'largest UK seizure since 2015' as drugs found in banana shipment
items.description: The seizure of nearly four tonnes of cocaine, with a street value of more than £300m, is the UK's biggest cocaine bust since 2015, the home secretary has said.

items.title: Man accused of murdering stepson didn't call ambulance because he was 'panicking', court hears
items.description: The stepfather accused of murdering five-year-old Logan Mwangi did not call an ambulance when he found the boy dead because he was "panicking", a court heard.

items.title: Israeli woman sentenced to death in UAE after cocaine found in her apartment
items.description: An Israeli women has reportedly been sentenced to death in the UAE after a court found her guilty of possessing cocaine in Abu Dhabi..
